info.title: ClearBank Financial Institutions API
info.description: ClearBank API endpoints for creating and managing accounts and transactions.

get.summary: Gets all accounts associated with your institution.
get.description: All accounts are returned except those which have been disabled or where the account is a virtual account.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 50.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, retrieved from the web portal.

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.
A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

type.description: A URI reference RFC3986 that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see RFC7231, Section 3.4)

status.description: The HTTP status code (RFC7231, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

errors.description: Human-readable validation errors specific to this occurrence of the problem.

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

get.summary: Gets a summary of all of the transactions from the institution.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 50.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: The start date time (when supplied) filters the result set to include transactions where the transaction time is either equal or greater than the value specified.

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: The end date time (when supplied) filters the result set to include transactions where the transaction time is either equal or less than the value specified.

parameters.name: paymentMethodType
parameters.description: The payment method type filters the results to include that payment method type.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, retrieved from the web portal.

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.
A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

type.description: A URI reference RFC3986 that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see RFC7231, Section 3.4)

status.description: The HTTP status code (RFC7231, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

errors.description: Human-readable validation errors specific to this occurrence of the problem.

get.summary: Gets a summary of all of the transactions from the specified virtual account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the real account. This can be retrieved from GET /v3/Accounts.

parameters.name: virtualAccountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the virtual account. This can be retrieved from GET /v2/Accounts/{accountId}/Virtual.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 50.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: The start date time (when supplied) filters the result set to include transactions where the transaction time is either equal or greater than the value specified.

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: The end date time (when supplied) filters the result set to include transactions where the transaction time is either equal or less than the value specified.

parameters.name: paymentMethodType
parameters.description: The payment method type filters the results to include that payment method type.

parameters.description: Your API Token, retrieved from the web portal.

get.summary: Lists all of the virtual accounts belonging to a given account.
get.description: All virtual accounts are returned including those which have been disabled. A Status field is available.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the real account. This can be retrieved from GET /v3/Accounts.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 50.

post.summary: Creates a series of virtual accounts.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the real account. This can be retrieved from GET /v3/Accounts.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestBody.description: Information that's used to create multiple virtual accounts.

accounts.description: A collection of all accounts belonging to the institution associated with the API token.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents one or more accounts and associated hypermedia links.

id.description: The unique identifier for the account.

name.description: The friendly name of the account.

label.description: The account holder label for the account.

type.description: Specifies the type of the account.

balances.description: Balances associated with the account in the given currencies.

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

upic.description: The Universal Payment Identification Code (UPIC) associated with the account.

cuid.description: The CHIPS Universal Identifier associated with the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents a summary of a given account.

templated.description: Specifies "true" if href is a URI template, i.e. with parameters. Otherwise, this property is absent or set to false.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: A single hypermedia link.

amount.description: The amount of monies, relative to the specified currency, in the account.

currency.description: Set to 'GBP' as other currencies are not supported.

status.description: The type of balance that is being reported.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: A summary of the balance of an account, in a specific currency.
Represents a single account and associated hypermedia links.

transactions.description: A collection of the transactions against the specified account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents one or more transactions against the specified institution and associated hypermedia links.

endToEndIdentifier.description: The scheme specific end to end transactional identifier.

transactionId.description: The unique identifier for this transaction.

transactionReference.description: The user supplied reference for the transaction.

transactionTime.description: The date/time the transaction occurred relative to UTC.

status.description: The current status of the transaction.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents information regarding a transaction.

instructedAmount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party.

currency.description: Set to 'GBP' as other currencies are not supported and not yet withdrawn on the day the message containing the currency is exchanged.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Indicates the amount and the currency used in a given transaction or account balance.
Information about the counterpart in a given transaction.

id.description: The unique identifier for the account.

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

upic.description: The Universal Payment Identification Code (UPIC) associated with the account.

cuid.description: The CHIPS Universal Identifier associated with the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents a summary of a given ultimate account.

iban.description: The IBAN number of the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: The identifible information of an account.

issuer.description: The name of the entity that assigns the identification.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Unique identification of an account, as assigned by the account servicer, using an identification scheme.

code.description: Name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.

proprietary.description: Name of the identification scheme, in a free text form.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Name of the identification scheme.

transactions.description: A collection of the transactions against the specified account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents one or more transactions against the specified account and associated hypermedia links.
Represents a transaction against the specified account and associated hypermedia links.

accounts.description: A collection of all accounts belonging to the institution associated with the API token.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents one or more accounts and associated hypermedia links.

id.description: The unique identifier for the virtual account.

name.description: The friendly name of the virtual account.

type.description: Specifies the type of the virtual account.

status.description: Specifies the status of the virtual account.

currency.description: Currencies used for the virtual account

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

upic.description: The Universal Payment Identification Code (UPIC) associated with the account.

cuid.description: The CHIPS Universal Identifier associated with the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents a summary of a given virtual account.

virtualAccounts.description: The virtual accounts that should be created.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Information that's used to create multiple virtual accounts.

ownerName.description: Virtual account owner name (account holder label).

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents the data required to create a virtual account.

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

proprietaryIdentifier.description: ClearBank proprietary identifier consisting of country code, sort code and account number.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V2.Mo.description: Represents ways of identifying a virtual account.
Provides the necessary links that are required after a virtual account has been accepted for processing.
Represents one or more virtual accounts and associated hypermedia links.
